hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` mkdir oldData #aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/newDictionary/metadata.json oldData/metadata.json #aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/newDictionary/dictionary.json oldData/dictionary.json #aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/newDictionary/managed_inputs.csv oldData/managed_inputs.csv
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/data/metadata_new_search.json oldData/metadata.json aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/dictionary.json oldData/dictionary.json aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/resources/Managed_Inputs.tsv oldData/managed_inputs.tsv #mv managed_inputs.tsv oldData/managed_inputs.tsv unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
csvcut -t -c "Study Abbreviated Name","Study Identifier","Study Full Name","Data Type","Study Type","Subject Type(s)","BDC Program(s)","Data is ready to process","Data Processed","Version","Phase","More Info Link","Additional Information Link (URL)","Additional Information Link (Label)","Request Access Text","BDC Program(s)" oldData/managed_inputs.tsv | csvformat -z 10000000 -D 'œÜ' > inputs.csv IFS='œÜ' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read study_abv study_id study_name data_type study_type subject_types program_name data_ready data_processed version phase more_info_link additional_info_link additional_info request_text program_name do if [[ "${data_ready,,}" == "yes" ]] && [[ "${data_processed,,}" == "no" ]]; then mkdir ${study_id} mkdir ${study_id}/output echo 'refœÜfull_nameœÜabbreviationœÜdescriptionœÜdata_typeœÜstudy_typeœÜsubject_typesœÜprogram_nameœÜversionœÜphaseœÜadditional_info_linkœÜadditional_infoœÜstudy_accessionœÜstudy_linkœÜrequest_access_textœÜprogram_name' >> ${study_id}/output/datasets.csv echo "${study_id}œÜ${study_name}œÜ${study_abv}œÜœÜ${data_type}œÜ${study_type}œÜ${subject_types}œÜ${program_name}œÜ${version}œÜ${phase}œÜ${additional_info_link}œÜ${additional_info}œÜ${study_id}.${version}.${phase}œÜ${more_info_link}œÜ${request_text}œÜ${program_name}" >> ${study_id}/output/datasets.csv jq 'with_entries(select(.key | contains("'${study_id}'")))' oldData/dictionary.json > ${study_id}/subset_dictionary.json jq '[.bio_data_catalyst[] | select(."study_identifier"=="'${study_id}'")]' oldData/metadata.json > ${study_id}/subset_metadata.json
java -jar jars/NewDictionaryConverter.jar --subsetDir "./${study_id}/" #do not touch the snake it breaks without the snake just trust me here csvformat -t -u0 -U3 -Qüêç -z 10000000 -D 'œÜ' ./${study_id}/concepts.tsv >${study_id}/output/concepts.csv csvformat -t -z 10000000 -D 'œÜ' ./${study_id}/consents.tsv > ${study_id}/output/consents.csv export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` aws s3 rm s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/newDictionary/${study_id}/ --recursive --exclude '*' --include '*.csv' aws s3 cp ./${study_id}/output/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/newDictionary/${study_id}/ --recursive --exclude '*' --include '*.csv' unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN fi done < inputs.csv
